title: Jalna
description: The Jalna saga unfolds the lives and loves of the unforgettable family whose heart is centered in Jalna, the great, rambling mansion from which the series takes its name.This is the story of two marriages--that of young Piers who has created a tumult by marrying without the family's consent . . . and of Eden, the poet, whose marriage to an outsider triggers a different, but equally powerful conflict ...
author: Mazo de la Roche
